title: Asphalt 8 Airborne 1.3.0.ipa
description:
<a href="http://s27.postimg.org/d18xgjcoj/assphalt.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://s27.postimg.org/d18xgjcoj/assphalt.jpg</a>

The new version of Asphalt 8: Airborne 1.3.0:
- We celebrate the onset of the Year Horses adding more horsepower to our game, and the new Asian locations! Ride the Great Chinese driving McLaren P1, Ferrari Testarossa, or any other machine, you dreamed of, and tell us about your travel friends with the new broadcasting function Twitch! 
- Explore the Far East: conquer the magnificent Great Wall of China, with its six new tracks - importantly, do not become distracted by the incredibly scenic landscape. 
- Integration Twitch: contact Asphalt-community through Twitch.tv and stream your game online, tell us about the best trick or consider the possibility of opponents. Consider yourself a better rider? Prove it on Twitch! 
- New cars: we regularly add new cars to the game, this time is a unique 2014 McLaren P1, iconic Ferrari Testarossa and powerful Dodge Challenger! I enjoy cross country race? Then in 2014 Ford F150 just for you! 
- Emotions at an altitude Take a new soundtrack to the road, and also open a lot of new features in the game!

DO NOT ask how to install cracked apps. There are many tutorials online that will teach you how. I WILL NOT HELP YOU!

TESTED ON: Jailbroken Ipod touch 5th Gen (ios 7) using iFunBox to install
